fin_strongly_measurable_of_strongly_meas:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/-

Authors: Rémy Degenne

theorem mem_ℒp.fin_strongly_measurable_of_strongly_measurable (hf : mem_ℒp f p μ) (hf_meas : strongly_measurable f)
    (hp_ne_zero : p ≠ 0) (hp_ne_top : p ≠ ennreal.top) : fin_strongly_measurable f μ :=
  by
  borelize G
  haveI : separable_space (Set.range f ∪ {0} : Set G) := hf_meas.separable_space_range_union_singleton
  let fs := simple_func.approx_on f hf_meas.measurable (Set.range f ∪ {0}) 0 (by simp)
  refine' ⟨fs, _, _⟩
  · have h_fs_Lp : ∀ n, mem_ℒp (fs n) p μ := simple_func.mem_ℒp_approx_on_range hf_meas.measurable hf
    exact fun n => (fs n).measure_support_lt_top_of_mem_ℒp (h_fs_Lp n) hp_ne_zero hp_ne_top
  · intro x
    apply simple_func.tendsto_approx_on
    apply subset_closure
    simp
#align mem_ℒp.fin_strongly_measurable_of_strongly_measurable mem_ℒp.fin_strongly_measurable_of_strongly_measurable
fin_strongly_measurable:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
theorem Lp.fin_strongly_measurable (f : Lp G p μ) (hp_ne_zero : p ≠ 0) (hp_ne_top : p ≠ ennreal.top) :
    fin_strongly_measurable f μ :=
  (Lp.mem_ℒp f).fin_strongly_measurable_of_strongly_measurable (Lp.strongly_measurable f) hp_ne_zero hp_ne_top
#align Lp.fin_strongly_measurable Lp.fin_strongly_measurable
ae_fin_strongly_measurable:
theorem integrable.ae_fin_strongly_measurable (hf : integrable f μ) : ae_fin_strongly_measurable f μ :=
  (mem_ℒp_one_iff_integrable.mpr hf).ae_fin_strongly_measurable one_ne_zero ENNReal.coe_ne_top
#align integrable.ae_fin_strongly_measurable integrable.ae_fin_strongly_measurable
